Dialogue: Queen Elsa! Don't be the monster they fear you are.  Elsa snaps out of her rage. She sees the men, frightened, moments from death. She stops. Elsa looks to Hans, overwhelmed, frightened.  The wall retreats from the thug on the balcony. The ice spikes lower from the second thug's neck. He takes advantage and aims his crossbow at Elsa's back.  Seeing it. Hans runs and pushes the crossbow up just as the arrow releases. The arrow hits the ice chandelier, hanging directly above Elsa.  The chandelier comes CRASHING DOWN.  Elsa dives out of the way but she falls in the blast.  All we see is ice smashing like glass, and all we hear is the sound of it shattering as it rings out.  CUT TO BLACK.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: I couldn't just let them kill you. 91 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: elsa
Dialogue: But I'm a danger to Arendelle. Get Anna.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: I will do what I can.

Speaker: kristoff
Dialogue: Just hang in there.  Come on, buddy, faster!

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: I'll meet you guys at the castle! 92 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: gerda
Dialogue: Anna! Oh, you had us worried sick.

Speaker: gerda
Dialogue: You poor girl, you're freezing. Let's get you inside. 93 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: kristoff
Dialogue: Get her warm and find Prince Hans, immediately.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: I'm going back out to look for Princess Anna.

Speaker: french dignitary
Dialogue: You cannot risk going out there again.

Speaker: spanish dignitary
Dialogue: If anything happens to the Princess, you are all Arendelle has left.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Hans, you have to kiss me.

Speaker: gerda
Dialogue: We'll give you two some privacy.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Elsa struck me with her powers.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: You said she'd never hurt you.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: She froze my heart and only an act of true love can save me.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: As thirteenth in line in my own kingdom, I didn't stand a chance. I knew I'd have to marry into the throne somewhere--

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: As heir, Elsa was preferable, of course. But no one was getting anywhere with her. But you-

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: You were so desperate for love you were willing to marry me, just like that.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Hans. No, stop. 96 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: But then she doomed herself, and you were dumb enough to go after her.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: All that's left now is to kill Elsa and bring back summer.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: No, you're no match for Elsa. I, on the other hand, am the hero who is going to save Arendelle from destruction.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: You won't get away with this.

Speaker: duke
Dialogue: It's getting colder by the minute. If we don't do something soon, we'll all freeze to death.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: She was killed by Queen Elsa.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: At least we got to say our marriage vows...before she died in my arms.

Speaker: duke
Dialogue: There can be no doubt now; Queen Elsa is a monster and we are all in grave danger.

Speaker: spanish dignitary
Dialogue: Prince Hans, Arendelle looks to you.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: With a heavy heart, I charge Queen Elsa of Arendelle with treason and sentence her to death.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Olaf? Olaf. Get away from there.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Whoa! So this is heat....  I love it.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: I was wrong about him. It wasn't true love.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Huh. But we ran all the way here?

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Please Olaf, you can't stay here; you'll melt.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: I am not leaving here until we find some other act of true love to save you.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: I don't even know what love is.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Wow, you really don't know anything about love, do you?

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Some people are worth melting for.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Wow, he's really moving fast. Huh.... I guess I was wrong. I guess Kristoff doesn't love you enough to leave you behind.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: No, no, no, no, no. You need to stay by the fire and keep warm.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: I need to get to Kristoff.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Oh, oh, oh, I know why.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: Elsa. You can't run from this!

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: Your sister? She returned from the mountain weak and cold. She said you froze her heart.

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: I tried to save her, but it was too late. Her skin was ice. Her hair turned white...

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: An act of true love will thaw a frozen heart.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: I knew you could do it.

Speaker: olaf
Dialogue: Hands down, this is the best day of my life...and quite possibly the last.

Speaker: elsa
Dialogue: Oh, Olaf. Hang on, little guy. 108 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: hans
Dialogue: Anna? But she froze your heart.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: The only frozen heart around here is yours.

Speaker: french dignitary
Dialogue: I will return this scoundrel to his country. We shall see what his twelve big brothers think of his behavior.

Speaker: kai
Dialogue: Arendelle thanks you, my Lord. 109 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: duke
Dialogue: This is unacceptable. I am innocent. I'm a victim of fear. I've been traumatized.  Ow! My neck hurts. Is there a doctor I could...No? And I demand to see the Queen!

Speaker: kai
Dialogue: I have a message from the Queen.  Arendelle will henceforth and forever no longer do business of any sort with Weaseltown.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on!

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Okay. Okay. Here we are. 110 FROZEN - J. Lee

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Yes. And it's the latest model.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: You have to. No returns. No exchanges. Queen's orders. She's named you the official Arendelle Ice Master and Deliverer.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Sure it is. And it even has a cup holder.... Do you like it?

Speaker: elsa
Dialogue: We are never closing them again.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: What? Oh, Elsa, they're beautiful, but you know I don't ska--

Dialogue: Look out. Reindeer coming through! 112 FROZEN - J. Lee
